effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 363 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,646 or your lowest secondary stat by 4,600 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
